description: This easy spiral pasta dish is a weeknight dinner saviour. It's on the table in 20 minutes and has all the flavours you know and love, with a hint of chilli to give it a spicy kick. Pasta night just got better!
name: Quick Arrabiata Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g canned cherry tomatoes in juice

recipeInstructions.text: Tear three-quarters of the basil. Add pasta, reserved cooking liquid and torn basil to pan and stir to combine. Serve sprinkled with parmesan and topped with remaining basil.
